description:
Now you can enjoy the beloved “Where is the Puppy” Book series from Sesame Workshop on your HP Touchpad! When Elmo sees a little black puppy on Sesame Street, he wants to find it a home – but first he has to catch it! Come with Elmo as he explores Sesame Street, meeting old friends, learning about the neighborhood, and looking for the little lost puppy. 

  ***

Where is the little lost puppy? Elmo thinks he may have gone into 123 Sesame Street, where Elmo’s pals Ernie and Bert live. Is the puppy in the kitchen? Or is he in the bathtub with Ernie? Help Elmo find the puppy, and learn all about Bert and Ernie’s apartment along the way!

Narrated by Chris from Sesame Street.

  **Features**

  • Full Narration: Listen to Chris from Sesame Street read the story aloud.
  • Page Flow: Move along each illustration in tandem with the story -- see a big story transformed for a small screen.
  • Visual Table of Contents: Jump easily to your favorite parts of the story, or resume reading where you left off. 
 
**About Us**

  • Sesame Workshop is the nonprofit educational organization that revolutionized children’s media with the landmark Sesame Street. Learn more at www.sesameworkshop.org. 

  • ScrollMotion Kids helps families discover new ways to learn and play, combining your favorite childhood stories with the wonder of digital interactivity. To find out more, please visit www.scrollmotionkids.com
